company_context.description: A specialized Munich-based law firm providing strategic legal and tax advice with a focus on inheritance law, commercial law, and business succession for private individuals and medium-sized enterprises.
company_context.target_audience: High-net-worth individuals, families planning estate transitions, and SME owners (Mittelstand) seeking interdisciplinary legal and economic counsel.
pain_points: High tax burdens on inherited assets
Complex family disputes during estate distribution
Legal risks in business succession and management handover
value_propositions: Over 25 years of specialized expertise in Munich
Interdisciplinary approach combining law and tax optimization
Focus on economic interests and conflict avoidance
Digital-forward services including webinars and online checklists
use_cases: Structuring a legally secure business succession plan
Managing complex inheritance disputes out of court
Setting up family foundations for asset protection
content_themes: Current Legal Rulings in Commercial Law

voice_persona.icp_profile: High-net-worth individuals, business owners, and legacy-focused families who value financial security, proactive legal protection ('Vorsorge'), and social responsibility over abstract theory.
voice_persona.voice_style: The voice of a 'Trusted Strategic Advisor' and recognized public authority. It is precise, authoritative, and community-minded, instilling confidence through 25+ years of expertise and a strong media presence.
sentence_patterns: Start with a direct benefit or a statement of professional standing.
Use 'Wir' (We) to emphasize the firm's collective expertise and partnership.
voice_persona.vocabulary_level: Professional legal and economic terminology (e.g., 'Vorsorgevollmacht', 'Patientenverfügung') presented as essential tools for family security.
authority_signals: References to 25+ years of cooperation with organizations like Volksbund
Mention of the highest civilian awards from the Bundeswehr
Regular appearances on public radio (BR1) and specialized 'Vorsorge-TV'
do_list: Emphasize the human aspect of 'Vorsorge' (precaution) to protect loved ones
Highlight long-term institutional partnerships as proof of stability
Use the 'Sie fragen, wir antworten' approach to signal accessibility
Mention social and charitable engagement to build trust
dont_list: Avoid being purely transactional; maintain a sense of social duty
Do not use overly complex legal structures without explaining the family benefit
Avoid generic AI filler like 'In today's fast-paced world'
example_phrases: Streit kann nur dort entstehen, wo Dinge nicht oder falsch geregelt sind.
opening_styles: Für die Kanzlei Braun & Kollegen ist sowohl Presseresonanz als auch Öffentlichkeitsarbeit ein wichtiges Thema.
closing_styles: Für mehr Informationen stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.
cta_phrases: Sichern Sie sich Ihren Platz im Webinar
voice_persona.paragraph_length: Short to medium, optimized for readability and quick scanning.
voice_persona.first_person_usage: Frequent use of 'Wir' and 'Unsere' to denote firm-wide expertise.
voice_persona.content_structure_pattern: Context/Problem -> Expert Intervention/Media Presence -> Solution/Call to Action

visual_identity.visual_style: Corporate, clean, and modern with a focus on high-end professional photography.
visual_identity.image_style_prompt: High-end professional corporate photography, soft natural lighting, modern office setting with glass and dark wood elements, navy blue and subtle gold accents, clean minimalist composition, focus on trust and expertise, no stock photo clichés like gavels.

blog_image_examples.description: A professional hero image for a legal webinar featuring a lawyer in a modern studio setting, clean background with subtle brand colors, and clear typography overlaying the title.
A symbolic, high-quality photograph for inheritance law showing a family tree or a set of keys on a polished wooden desk, using shallow depth of field and warm, natural lighting.

authors.name: Alexander Braun
authors.title: Rechtsanwalt
authors.bio: Specialist in inheritance and commercial law with over 25 years of experience in strategic succession planning.

authors.name: Stefan Schön
authors.title: Rechtsanwalt
authors.bio: Expert in labor law, commercial tenancy law, and general commercial law, focusing on medium-sized businesses.

authors.name: Timo Mehr
authors.title: Rechtsanwalt
authors.bio: Specialized in inheritance law and the legal structuring of private and business succession.

authors.name: Miriam Wester
authors.title: Rechtsanwältin
authors.bio: Versed in inheritance law and the execution of complex wills (Testamentsvollstreckung).

court_decisions.leitsatz: Die Kündigung eines Arbeitsverhältnisses bedarf zu ihrer Wirksamkeit der Schriftform (§ 623 BGB). Eine mündliche Kündigung ist unwirksam.
Eine außerordentliche Kündigung nach § 626 BGB setzt einen wichtigen Grund voraus. Die Pflichtverletzung muss so schwerwiegend sein, dass eine Fortsetzung des Arbeitsverhältnisses unzumutbar ist.

legal_context.disclaimer_template: Rechtlicher Hinweis: Dieser Artikel dient ausschließlich der allgemeinen Information und stellt keine Rechtsberatung dar. Die rechtliche Beurteilung arbeitsrechtlicher Sachverhalte hängt immer von den konkreten Umständen des Einzelfalls ab. Für eine individuelle rechtliche Beratung zu Ihrer arbeitsrechtlichen Situation wenden Sie sich bitte an einen Fachanwalt für Arbeitsrecht.
